document.full_text: prime minister morgan tsvangirai tried to breathe new life into his floundering mdc party on friday with plans for a leadership shake-up and a rousing speech in which he called his rivals "oppressors."
document.title: morgan tsvangirai tries to pump up party for zimbabwe vote
lines_and_colors: prime minister morgan tsvangirai tried to breathe new life into his floundering mdc party on friday with plans for a leadership shake-up and a rousing speech in which he called his rivals "oppressors."
